code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{UserContext}from'../contexts/UserContext';function UserInput(){var userContext=useContext(UserContext);var user=userContext.user,handleSetUserName=userContext.handleSetUserName;return React.createElement("section",null,React.createElement("strong",null,"User Name: "),React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"name",onChange:handleSetUserName,value:user.name}));}export default UserInput;
